name: Klondike Solitaire Collection
summary: Do you love Klondike (also known as "Classic Solitaire" or "Patience"), but want a bigger challenge? Now you can play Klondike and other popular variants with different levels of difficulty. The collection contains 10 different games • Agnes Bernauer • Batsford • Blind Alleys • Giant • King Albert • Klondike • Lady Jane • Pas Seul • Thumb and Pouch • Westcliff Features: • Unlimited undo • Auto complete • Statistics • Rules for each game
